title: Honest Review: PES University MCA Placements - Worth it?
content:
Hey guys!!

I'm looking for an honest review about PES University's MCA placement structure, placement ratio, and average package students get. Has anyone had any experience with their MCA program?

comments.body: My friend is in the final semester of their MCA, he says its not worth it. The placement opportunities arenâ€™t as good as they are for BTech graduates. Most of the hiring is done by mass recruiters like Wipro and Infosys.
